title: Biden's generation is ceding the stage as he plots his next act
description: When Nancy Pelosi stepped down, she had a successor in mind. The field that follows President Biden is far less certain.

title: Black mayors are leading the nation's biggest cities for the first time
description: New York, Los Angeles, Chicago and Houston will all have Black leaders once Karen Bass is sworn in next month as the first woman to serve as chief executive in LA.
